description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.Pf9uh67LQ85K52AF]{Cache Hacks (Su)}

The technowitch bends reality to their whims with their spell cache, creating a world molded to their desires.

First Slot (6th Level): @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} (1st level), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.3yVTzdZy7GIxtk4h]{Incompetence}*, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.jvJfulZZMmoO3gDs]{Lifting Frame}*, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} (1st level)

Second Slot (12th Level): @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.cRnYtsbLQzNnIs1n]{Command Undead}*, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} (2nd level or lower), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} (2nd level or lower), or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.jA6eTWFaULIpjXAx]{Spider Climb}

Third Slot (18th Level): @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.3MJvj8HOhmqsq2pj]{Flight} (3rd level or lower), @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.u564kHSvy4CR683Z]{Remote Pilot}*, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.tcfcgX5n2Z6dFf8A]{Phantom Cycle}, or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.spells.Item.gNgdSyi4pXQmasmc]{Polymorph} (3rd level or lower)
